titles.title: National Telehealth Strategy and Data Advancement Act
To amend the Public Health Service Act to advance telehealth by developing a plan for adoption and coordination by Federal agencies, and for other purposes.
National Telehealth Strategy and Data Advancement Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
National Telehealth Strategy and Data Advancement Act
This bill reauthorizes through FY2025 grants administered by the Office for the Advancement of Telehealth for telehealth networks and telehealth resource centers. It also directs the Department of Health and Human Services to advance and coordinate federal telehealth efforts by, among other activities, developing a plan to align telehealth initiatives across federal agencies and standardizing certain telehealth grant processes and reporting measures.
